dcterms:creator: G.J. Brostow
J. Shotton
J. Fauqueur
R. Cipolla
dcterms:description: The CamVid road scenes dataset originates from fully segmented videos from the perspective of a driving car. It consists of 367 frames for training, 101 frames for validation and 233 frames for testing of RGB images with a 480 Ã— 360 input resolution. There are 11 manually labelled classes that include roads, cars, signs etc. and a background that is usually ignored during training and evaluation.
dcterms:title: CamVid

dcterms:creator: L. Nguyen
dcterms:description: The bacteria dataset comprises of 366 darkfield microscopy images with manually annotated masks for segmentation. The task is to detect bacteria of the phylum Spirochaetes in blood, leading to a problem of segmenting two classes corresponding to the bacteria and red blood cells.
dcterms:title: Bacteria
